lines.transliteration_english: Satigur Daras Dhiaan Giaan Anjam Kai , Mitr Satrataa Nivaaree Pooran Braham Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: By concentrating mind on the vision and by toiling on Naam Simran with rapt attention, one destroys all enmity and friendship and experiences presence of One Lord God.

lines.gurmukhi: gur aupdys prvys Awid kau Awdys ausqiq inMdw myit gMimqw Agm hY
lines.transliteration_english: Gur Oupadays Paravays Aadi Kau Aadaysa , Ousatati Nindaa Mayti Ganmitaa Agam Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: By imbibing the words of the Guru in one's heart and by the counsel of the True Guru can one indulge in His praise humbly. All desires of praise and slander are destroyed and one reaches the inaccessible Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: crn srin ghy Dwvq brij rwKy Awsw mnsw Qkq sPl jnm hY
lines.transliteration_english: Charan Sarani Gahay Dhaavat Baraji Raakhay , Aasaa Manasaa Dakat Sadhal Janam Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: By taking the refuge of a True Guru, a mind chasing vices and other evil pleasures come to rest. All desires and expectations end. Thus a human birth becomes a success.
